metadata.name: Domain Trust Discovery Via Dsquery
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "dsquery.exe" for domain trust discovery

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\dsquery.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('dsquery.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('trusteddomain')))

output.summary: Detects execution of "dsquery.exe" for domain trust discovery

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use of the utilities by legitimate user for legitimate reason References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1482/T1482.md, https://posts.specterops.io/an-introduction-to-manual-active-directory-querying-with-dsquery-and-ldapsearch-84943c13d7eb?gi=41b97a644843
